execLiquidation(DataType.Vault storage,m.notice: Anyone can liquidates the vault if its vault value is less than Min. Deposit. Up to 100% of debt is repaid.

isVaultSafe(DataType.Vault,mapping(uint2.notice: Checks the vault is safe or not. if the vault value is greater than Min. Deposit, then return true. otherwise return false.

userdoc.notice: Implements the base logic for all the actions related to liquidation call.
